Global_GetBot.description:
Global
return hUnit 
Returns a handle to the bot on which the script is currently being run (if applicable).

Global_GetTeam.description:
Global
return int 
Gets team to which this unit belongs.

Global_GetTeamMember.description:
Global
return hUnit 
Returns a handle to the Nth player on the team.

Global_IsTeamPlayer.description:
Global
return bool 
Returns whether the player is on Radiant or Dire

Global_IsPlayerBot.description:
Global
return bool 
Returns whether the specified playerID is a bot.

Global_GetTeamForPlayer.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the team for the specified playerID

Global_DotaTime.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the game time. Matches game clock. Pauses with game pause.

Global_GameTime.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the time since the hero picking phase started. Pauses with game pause.

Global_RealTime.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the real-world time since the app has started. Does not pause with game pause.

Global_GetUnitToUnitDistance.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the distance between two units.

Global_GetUnitToUnitDistanceSqr.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the squared distance between two units.

Global_GetUnitToLocationDistance.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the distance between a unit and a location.

Global_GetUnitToLocationDistanceSqr.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the squared distance between a unit and a location.

Global_IsLocationPassable.description:
Global
return bool 
Returns whether the specified location is passable.

Global_IsRadiusVisible.description:
Global
return bool 
Returns whether a circle of the specified radius at the specified location is visible.

Global_IsLocationVisible.description:
Global
return bool 
Returns whether the specified location is visible.

Global_GetHeightLevel.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the height value (1 through 5) of the specified location.

Global_GetItemCost.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the cost of the specified item.

Global_IsItemPurchasedFromSecretShop.description:
Global
return bool 
Returns if the specified item is purchased from the secret shops.

Global_IsItemPurchasedFromSideShop.description:
Global
return bool 
Returns if the specified item can be purchased from the side shops.

Global_GetItemStockCount.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the current stock count of the specified item.

Global_GetPushLaneDesire.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the team's current desire to push the specified lane.

Global_GetDefLaneDesire.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the team's current desire to def the specified lane.

Global_GetFarmLaneDesire.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the team's current desire to farm the specified lane.

Global_GetRoamDesire.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the team's current desire to roam to a target.

Global_GetRoamTarget.description:
Global
return hUnit 
Returns the team's current roam target.

Global_GetRoshanDesire.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the team's current desire to kill Roshan.

Global_GetGameState.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the current game state.

Global_GetGameStateTimeRemaining.description:
Global
return float 
Returns how much time is remaining in the current game state,if applicable.

Global_GetGameMode.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the current game mode.

Global_GetHeroPickState.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the current hero pick state.

Global_IsPlayerInHeroSelectionControl.description:
Global
return bool 
Returns whether the specified player is in selection control when picking a hero.

Global_SelectHero.description:
Global
return nil
Selects a hero for the specified player.

Global_GetSelectedHeroName.description:
Global
return string 
Returns the name of the hero the specified player has selected.

Global_IsInCMBanPhase.description:
Global
return bool 
Returns whether we're in a Captains Mode ban phase.

Global_IsInCMPickPhase.description:
Global
return bool 
Returns whether we're in a Captains Mode pick phase.

Global_GetCMPhaseTimeRemaining.description:
Global
return float 
Gets the time remaining in the current Captains Mode phase.

Global_GetCMCaptain.description:
Global
return int 
Gets the Player ID of the Captains Mode Captain.

Global_SetCMCaptain.description:
Global
return nil
Gets the Captains Mode Captain to the specified Player ID.

Global_IsCMBannedHero.description:
Global
return bool 
Returns whether the specified hero has been banned in a Captains Mode game.

Global_IsCMPickedHero.description:
Global
return bool 
Returns whether the specified hero has been picked in a Captains Mode game.

Global_CMBanHero.description:
Global
return nil
Bans the specified hero in a Captains Mode game.

Global_CMPickHero.description:
Global
return nil
Picks the specified hero in a Captains Mode game.

Global_RandomInt.description:
Global
return int 
Returns a random integer between nMin and nMax,inclusive.

Global_RandomFloat.description:
Global
return float 
Returns a random float between nMin and nMax,inclusive.

Global_RandomVector.description:
Global
return vector 
Returns a vector of fLength pointing in a random direction in the X/Y axis.

Global_RollPercentage.description:
Global
return bool 
Rolls a numbmer from 1 to 100 and returns whether it is less than or equal to the specified number.

Global_Min.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the smaller of fOption1 and fOption2.

Global_Max.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the larger of fOption1 and fOption2.

Global_Clamp.description:
Global
return float 
Returns fValue clamped within the bounds of fMin and fMax.

Global_RemapVal.description:
Global
return float 
Returns fValue linearly remapped onto fFrom to fTo.

Global_RemapValClamped.description:
Global
return float 
Returns fValue linearly remapped onto fFrom to fTo,while also clamping within their bounds.

Global_GetUnitPotentialValue.description:
Global
return int 
Gets the 0-255 potential location value of a hero at the specified location and radius.

Global_IsCourierAvailable.description:
Global
return bool 
Returns if the courier is available to use.

Global_GetNumCouriers.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the number of team couriers

Global_GetCourier.description:
Global
return hCourier 
Returns a handle to the specified courier (zero based index)

Global_GetCourierState.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the current state of the specified courier.

Global_GetTreeLocation.description:
Global
return vector 
Returns the specified tree location.

Global_GetRuneSpawnLocation.description:
Global
return vector 
Returns the location of the specified rune spawner.

Global_GetShopLocation.description:
Global
return vector 
Returns the location of the specified shop.

Global_GetTimeOfDay.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the time of day 
 0.0 is midnight,0.5 is noon.

Global_GetTower.description:
Global
return hUnit 
Returns the specified tower.

Global_GetBarracks.description:
Global
return hUnit 
Returns the specified barracks.

Global_GetShrine.description:
Global
return hUnit 
Returns the specified shrine.

Global_GetAncient.description:
Global
return hUnit 
Returns the specified ancient.

Global_GetGlyphCooldown.description:
Global
return float 
Get the current Glyph cooldown in seconds. Will return 0 if it is off cooldown.

Global_GetRoshanKillTime.description:
Global
return float 
Get the last time that Roshan was killed.

Global_GetLaneFrontAmount.description:
Global
return float 
Return the lane front amount (0.0 - 1.0) of the specified team's creeps along the specified lane. Optionally can ignore towers.

Global_GetLaneFrontLocation.description:
Global
return vector 
Returns the location of the lane front for the specified team and lane. Always ignores towers. Has a third parameter for a distance delta from the front.

Global_GetLocationAlongLane.description:
Global
return vector 
Returns the location the specified amount (0.0 - 1.0) along the specified lane.

Global_GetOpposingTeam.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the opposing Team ID.

Global_IsHeroAlive.description:
Global
return bool 
Returns whether the specified PlayerID's hero is alive.

Global_GetHeroLevel.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the specified PlayerID's hero's level.

Global_GetHeroKills.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the specified PlayerID's hero's kill count.

Global_GetHeroDeaths.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the specified PlayerID's hero's death count.

Global_GetHeroAssists.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the specified PlayerID's hero's assists count.

Global_GetRuneType.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the rune type of the rune at the specified location,if known.

Global_GetRuneStatus.description:
Global
return int 
Returns the status of the rune at the specified location.

Global_GetRuneTimeSinceSeen.description:
Global
return float 
Returns how long it's been since we've seen the rune at the specified location.

Global_GetShrineCooldown.description:
Global
return float 
Returns the current cooldown of the specified Shrine.

Global_IsShrineHealing.description:
Global
return bool 
Returns whether the specified shrine is currently healing.

Global_AddAvoidanceZone.description:
Global
return int 
Adds an avoidance zone for use with GeneratePath. Takes a Vector with x and y as a 2D location, and z as as radius. Returns a handle to the avoidance zone.

Global_RemoveAvoidanceZone.description:
Global
return nil 
Removes the specified avoidance zone.

Global_GeneratePath.description:
Global
return nil 
Pathfinds from vStar to vEnd,avoiding all the specified avoidance zones and the ones specified with AddAvoidanceZone. Will call funcCompltion when done,which is a that has two parameters: a distance of the path,and a table that contains all the waypoints of the path. If the pathfind fails,it will call that with a distance of 0 and an empty waypoint table.

Global_DebugDrawLine.description:
Global
return nil 
Draws a line from vStar to vEnd in the specified color for one frame.

Global_DebugDrawCircle.description:
Global
return nil 
Draws a circle at vCenter with radius fRadius in the specified color for one frame.

Global_DebugDrawText.description:
Global
return nil 
Draws the specified text at fScreenX,fScreenY on the screen in the specified color for one frame.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_Action_ClearActions.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Clear action queue and return to idle and optionally stop in place with bStop true

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionQueue_MoveToLocat.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to move to the specified location,this is not a precision move

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionQueue_MoveDirectl.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to move to the specified location,bypassing the bot pathfinder. Identical to a user's right-click.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionQueue_MovePath.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to move along the specified path.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionQueue_MoveToUnit.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to move to the specified unit,this will continue to follow the unit

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionQueue_AttackUnit.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Tell a unit to attack a unit with an option bool to stop after one attack if true

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionQueue_AttackMove.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Tell a unit to attack-move a location.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionQueue_UseAbility.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to use a non-targeted ability or item

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionQueue_UseAbilityO.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to use a unit targeted ability or item on the specified target unit

CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to use a ground targeted ability or item on the specified location

CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to use a tree targeted ability or item on the specified tree

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionQueue_PickUpRune.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a hero to pick up the rune at the specified rune location.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionQueue_PickUpItem.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to pick up the specified item

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionQueue_DropItem.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to drop the specified item and the provided location

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionQueue_UseShrine.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to use the specified shrine

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionQueue_Delay.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to delay for the specified amount of time.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionImmediate_Purchas.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Command a bot to purchase the specified item. Item names can be found here.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionImmediate_SellIte.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to sell the specified item

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionImmediate_Disasse.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to disassemble the specified item

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionImmediate_SetItem.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to lock or unlock combining of the specified item

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionImmediate_SwapIte.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to swap the items in index1 and index2 in their inventory. Indices are zero based with 0-5 corresponding to inventory,6-8 are backpack and 9-15 are stash

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionImmediate_Courier.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command the courier specified by hCourier to perform one of the courier Actions.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionImmediate_Buyback.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Tell a hero to buy back from .

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionImmediate_Glyph.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return death. 
Tell a hero to use Glyph.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionImmediate_LevelAb.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to level an ability or a talent. Ability and talent names can be found here

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionImmediate_Chat.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Have a bot say something in team chat,bAllChat true to say to all chat instead

CDOTA_Bot_Script_ActionImmedaite_Ping.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Command a bot to ping the specified coordinates with bNormalPing setting the ping type

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetCurrentActionType.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Get the type of the currently active Action.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_NumQueuedActions.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Get number of actions in the action queue.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetQueuedActionType.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Get the type of the specified queued action.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsBot.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is a bot (otherwise they are a human).

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetDifficulty.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the difficulty level of this bot.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetUnitName.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return string 
Gets the name of the unit. Note that this is the under-the-hood name,not the normal (localized) name that you'd see for the unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetPlayerID.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the Player ID of the unit,used in functions that refer to a player rather than a specific unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsHero.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is a hero.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsIllusion.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is an illusion. Always returns false on enemies.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsCreep.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is a creep.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsAncientCreep.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is an ancient creep.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsBuilding.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is a building. This includes towers,barracks,filler buildings,and the ancient.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsTower.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is a tower.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsFort.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is the ancient.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_CanBeSeen.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Check if a unit can currently be seen by your team.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetActiveMode.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Get the bots currently active mode. This may not track modes in complete takeover bots.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetActiveModeDesire.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Gets the desire of the currently active mode.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetHealth.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the health of the unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetMaxHealth.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the maximum health of the specified unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetHealthRegen.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the current health regen per second of the unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetMana.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the current mana of the unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetMaxMana.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the maximum mana of the unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetManaRegen.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the current mana regen of the unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetBaseMovementSpeed.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the base movement speed of the unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetCurrentMovementSpeed.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the current movement speed (base + modifiers) of the unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsAlive.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns true if the unit is alive.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetRespawnTime.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns the number of seconds remaining for the unit to respawn. Returns -1.0 for non-heroes.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_HasBuyback.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns true if the unit has buyback available. Will return false for enemies or non-heroes.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetBuybackCost.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Returns the current gold cost of buyback. Will return -1 for enemies or non-heroes.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetBuybackCooldown.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns the current cooldown for buyback. Will return -1.0 for enemies or non-heroes.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetRemainingLifespan.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns the remaining lifespan in seconds of units with limited lifespans.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetBaseDamage.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns the average base damage of the unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetBaseDamageVariance.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns the +/- variance in the base damage of the unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetAttackDamage.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns actual attack damage (with bonuses) of the unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetAttackRange.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Returns the range at which the unit can attack another unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetAttackSpeed.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Returns the attack speed value of the unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetSecondsPerAttack.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns the number of seconds per attack (including backswing) of the unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetAttackPoint.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns the point in the animation where a unit will execute the attack.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetLastAttackTime.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns the time that the unit last executed an attack.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetAttackTarget.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return hUnit 
Returns a the attack target of the unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetAcquisitionRange.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Returns the range at which this unit will attack a target.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetAttackProjectileSpee.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Returns the speed of the unit's attack projectile.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetActualIncomingDamage.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Gets the incoming damage value after reductions deping on damage type.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetAttackCombatProficie.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Gets the damage multiplier when attacking the specified target.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetDefCombatProficiency.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Gets the damage multiplier when being attacked by the specified attacker.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetSpellAmp.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Gets the spell amplification debuff percentage of this unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetArmor.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Gets the armor of this unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetMagicResist.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Gets the magic resist value of this unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetEvasion.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Gets the evasion percentage of this unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetPrimaryAttribute.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the primary stat of this unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetAttributeValue.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the value of the specified stat. Returns -1 for non-heroes.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetBountyXP.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the XP bounty value for killing this unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetBountyGoldMin.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the minimum gold bounty value for killing this unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetBountyGoldMax.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the maximum gold bounty value for killing this unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetXPNeededToLevel.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the amount of XP needed for this unit to gain a level. Returns -1 for non-heroes.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetAbilityPoints.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Get the number of ability points available to this bot.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetLevel.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the level of this unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetGold.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the current gold amount for this unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetNetWorth.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the current total net worth for this unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetStashValue.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the current value of all items in this unit's stash.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetCourierValue.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the current value of all items on couriers that this unit owns.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetLastHits.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the current last hit count for this unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetDenies.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the current deny count for this unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetBoundingRadius.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Gets the bounding radius of this unit. Used for attack ranges and collision.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetLocation.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return vector 
Gets the location of this unit. int

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetFacing.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil
Gets the facing of this unit on a 360 degree rotation. (0 - 359). Facing East is 0,North is 90,West is 180,South is 270.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsFacingLocation.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns if the unit is facing the specified location,within an nDegrees cone.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetGroundHeight.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Gets ground height of the location of this unit. Note: This call can be very expensive! Use sparingly.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetVelocity.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return vector 
Gets the unit's current velocity.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetDayTimeVisionRange.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the unit's vision range during the day.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetNightTimeVisionRange.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the unit's vision range during the night.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetCurrentVisionRange.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the unit's current vision range.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetHealthRegenPerStr.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Returns the health regen per second per point in strength.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetManaRegenPerInt.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Returns the mana regen per second per point in intellect.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetAnimActivity.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Returns the current animation activity the unit is playing.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetAnimCycle.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns the amount through the current animation (0.0 - 1.0)

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetAbilityByName.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return hAbility 
Gets a handle to the named ability. Ability names can be found in here

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetAbilityInSlot.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return hAbility 
Gets a handle to ability in the specified slot. Slots range from 0 to 23.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetItemInSlot.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return hItem 
Gets a handle to item in the specified inventory slot. Slots range from 0 to 16.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_FindItemSlot.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the inventory slot the named item is in. Item names can be found here.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetItemSlotType.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the type of the specified inventory slot.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsChanneling.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is currently channeling an ability or item.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsUsingAbility.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit's active ability is a UseAbility action. Note that this will be true while a is currently using an ability or item.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsCastingAbility.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is actively casting an ability or item. Does not include movement or backswing.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetCurrentActiveAbility.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return hAbility 
Gets a handle to ability that's currently being used.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsAttackImmune.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is immune to attacks.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsBlind.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is blind and will miss all of its attacks.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsBlockDisabled.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is disabled from blocking attacks.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsDisarmed.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is disarmed and unable to attack.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsDominated.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit has been dominated.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsEvadeDisabled.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is unable to evade attacks.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsHexed.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is hexed into an adorable animal.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsInvisible.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit has an invisibility effect. Note that this does NOT guarantee invisibility to the other team 
 if they have detection,they can see you even IsInvisible returns true

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsInvulnerable.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is invulnerable to damage.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsMagicImmune.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is magic immune.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsMuted.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is item muted.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsNightmared.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is having bad dreams.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsRooted.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is rooted in place.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsSilenced.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is silenced and unable to use abilities.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsSpeciallyDeniable.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is deniable by allies due to a debuff.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsStunned.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit is stunned.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_IsUnableToMiss.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit will not miss due to evasion or attacking uphill.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_HasScepter.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit has ultimate scepter upgrades.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_WasRecentlyDamagedByAny.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit has been damaged by a hero in the specified interval.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_TimeSinceDamagedByAnyHe.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns whether the amount of time passed the unit has been damaged by a hero.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_WasRecentlyDamagedByHer.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit has been damaged by the specified hero in the specified interval.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_TimeSinceDamagedByHero.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns whether the amount of time passed the unit has been damaged by the specified hero.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_WasRecentlyDamagedByPla.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit has been damaged by the specified player in the specified interval.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_TimeSinceDamagedByPlaye.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns whether the amount of time passed the unit has been damaged by the specified hero.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_WasRecentlyDamagedByCre.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit has been damaged by a creep in the specified interval.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_TimeSinceDamagedByCreep.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns whether the amount of time passed the unit has been damaged by a creep.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_WasRecentlyDamagedByTow.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit has been damaged by a tower in the specified interval.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_TimeSinceDamagedByTower.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns whether the amount of time passed the unit has been damaged by a tower.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_DistanceFromFountain.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the units straight-line distance from the teams fountain (0 is in the fountain).

CDOTA_Bot_Script_DistanceFromSecretShop.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the units straight-line distance from the closest secret shop (0 is in a secret shop).

CDOTA_Bot_Script_DistanceFromSideShop.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the units straight-line distance from the closest side shop (0 is in a side shop).

CDOTA_Bot_Script_SetTarget.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Sets the target to be a specific unit. Doesn't actually execute anything,just potentially useful for communicating a target between modes/items.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetTarget.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return hUnit 
Gets the target that's been set for a unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_SetNextItemPurchaseValu.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return nil 
Sets the value of the next item to purchase. Doesn't actually execute anything,just potentially useful for communicating a purchase target for modes like Farm.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetNextItemPurchaseValu.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the purchase value that's been set.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetAssignedLane.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Gets the assigned lane of this unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetOffensivePower.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Gets an estimate of the current offensive power of a unit. Derived from the average amount of damage it can do to all enemy heroes.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetRawOffensivePower.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Gets an estimate of the current offensive power of a unit. Derived from the average amount of damage it can do to all enemy heroes,ignoring cooldown and mana status.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetStunDuration.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Gets an estimate of the duration of a stun that a unit can cast. If bCurrentlyAvailable is true,it takes into account mana and cooldown status.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetSlowDuration.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Gets an estimate of the duration of a slow that a unit can cast. If bCurrentlyAvailable is true,it takes into account mana and cooldown status.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_HasBlink.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit has a blink available to them.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_HasMinistunOnAttack.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit has a ministun when they attack.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_HasSilence.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit has a silence available to them.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_HasInvisibility.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit has an invisibility-causing item or ability available to them.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_UsingItemBreaksInvisibi.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether using an item would break the unit's invisibility.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetExtrapolatedLocation.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return vector 
Returns the extrapolated location of the unit fTime seconds into the future,based on its current movement.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetMovementDirectionSta.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return float 
Returns how stable the direction of the unit's movement is a value of 1.0 means they've been moving in a straight line for a while,where 0.0 is completely random movement.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_HasModifier.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return bool 
Returns whether the unit has the specified modifer.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetModifierByName.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Returns the modifier index for the specified modifier.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_NumModifiers.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Returns the number of modifiers on the unit.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetModifierName.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Returns the name of the specified modifier.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetModifierStackCount.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Returns stack count of the specified modifier.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetModifierRemainingDur.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Returns remaining duration of the specified modifier.

CDOTA_Bot_Script_GetModifierAuxiliaryUni.description:
CDOTA_Bot_Script:
return int 
Returns a table containing handles to units that the modifier is responsible for,such as Ember Spirit remnants.
